parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To sow, spread, scatter. Probably strengthened from spao; to scatter, i.e. Sow.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
To sow, spread, scatter. Probably strengthened from spao; to scatter, i.e. Sow.
